title: Whose side do you take?
body:
So many champs have a 'rivalry' of sorts, and we all have biases due to our favourite champs or champs we hate.
So I'm wondering, what sides do we all take?

1. Aatrox vs Tryndamere
2. Ashe vs Sejuani vs Lissandra
3. Aurelion Sol vs Targon _(mostly Pantheon)_
4. Azir vs Xerath
5. Caitlin/Vi vs Jinx
6. Darius vs Garen
7. Leona vs Diana
8. Gangplank vs Miss Fortune
9. Graves vs Twised Fate _(even though this isn't a thing anymore) _
10. Kalista vs Hecarim
11. Kassadin vs Malzahar
12. Kayle vs Morgana
13. Kha'Zix vs Rengar
14. Lucian vs Thresh
15. Nasus vs Renekton
16. Riven vs Yasuo
17. Rumble vs Teemo _(rivals in love)_
18. Shen vs Zed
19. Urgot vs Garen
20. Volibear vs Zilean

I may have missed some, I'm not sure.

If Garen wins, that means less Darius, which means easier lanes.

Calculated! xD
it's garen vs katarina. get it right.
